name: places/ChIJ7adpxLtZwokRn7dbn2Uq_mc
formattedAddress: 411 W 22nd St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 411 W 22nd St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text:
Lucy was an absolute delight to work with.  I first met her a little over a year before my wedding, on the day of my sister's wedding!  Before I even saw the beautiful work she does, I noticed the way she offered an upbeat but calming and assured presence in the getting ready room.  I booked her immediately after my sister's big day!

I did two hair and makeup trials with Lucy prior to my wedding day, which I highly recommend.  Lucy did exactly what my inspiration pictures showed at my first trial, I just ended up not liking it on me as much as I thought I would, but struggled to explain it.  She was immediately able to understand why - frankly she read my mind.  She was able to verbalize things I couldn't verbalize, and through that process created my DREAM look at our second trial.  Throughout the whole process she was patient, understanding, intuitive, and just plain FUN to spend a couple of hours with!

On the day of the wedding, her team arrived promptly and ready to go; all my bridesmaids were very happy with the work Lucy's team members provided.  She even stayed for touch ups after our ceremony, and was very understanding when our ceremony ran longer than I anticipated.

I could not recommend Lucy more if I tried!

originalText.text:
I first booked a trial with Lucy and she was very kind, efficient and thorough in her work. She was very considerate, and cooperative. Lucy gives compliments, she is easy to talk to and helps make any nervous bride relax. I also have hormonal problems which can affect my skin, and Lucy managed to work around that. All in all, I was very happy to work with her and I got a lot of compliments on my wedding day!
I wholeheartedly reccommend Lucy!

originalText.text: Miss Harlequin went above and beyond on my wedding day to ensure everyone was happy with their hair. Their team is incredibly talented and Lucy is so responsive and professional! From start to finish, she was easy to work with, friendly, knowledgeable and accommodating. Making the schedule work for hair & makeup is actually really hard if you are planning for bridesmaids and/or mothers of the bride & groom, but Lucy was so communicative and flexible every step of the way to ensure everything would go smooth and we would still get to the church on time! I loved the way my hair looked and knowing that Alicia and Lucy were absolute pro's made us all very relaxed on the big day. They were prompt, calm and fun. I highly recommend working with this team!

text.text: Miss Harlequin went above and beyond on my wedding day to ensure everyone was happy with their hair. Their team is incredibly talented and Lucy is so responsive and professional! From start to finish, she was easy to work with, friendly, knowledgeable and accommodating. Making the schedule work for hair & makeup is actually really hard if you are planning for bridesmaids and/or mothers of the bride & groom, but Lucy was so communicative and flexible every step of the way to ensure everything would go smooth and we would still get to the church on time! I loved the way my hair looked and knowing that Alicia and Lucy were absolute pro's made us all very relaxed on the big day. They were prompt, calm and fun. I highly recommend working with this team!

originalText.text: I booked Miss Harlequin for two wedding events. Lucy was quick to respond to all emails and was flexible when it came to adding people to my party or amending the day-of timeline. Alicia did my actual hair and makeup. She was fantastic. She was able to take the vision I had and make it a reality. Not only did my makeup last all day, she also gave me a little touch up packet so I could fix my makeup though it wasn't needed. Compared to the other services I researched, I found Miss Harlequin to be very reasonably priced. I highly recommend them for any hair and make up needs!

originalText.text: I booked Lucy's City Hall hair/makeup for my NYC elopement and she delivered exactly what I wanted! She listened when I said I wanted minimal makeup, not over-the-top glam. I looked like a beautiful, flawless version of myself. False lashes were included in the package. The waves in my hair stayed all day, which never happens. She answered every email quickly and even provided me with tips for the months leading up to my wedding. I highly recommend Lucy for your event!
